name: Card Flick
description:
Card Flick

I recently came across Flick Solitaire card game (through an article saying they raised $1M🤑 to do web3🌌 stuff) and thought it might be interesting to figure out what would a teaser game for it look like, or possibly for any other card game. I decided to do a simple game in portrait mode (to match the original game and be mobile friendly) which can be played with one finger and can be done in 30s or less.

I ended up combining choice-based swipe mechanic, like in a dating app or any of the games in the Reigns series, with a card deck and pixel art style (to match the tiny nature of the jam).
